long_description: this is because led based rlt like lumebox does not emit any uv rays, which is the damaging part of the light spectrum. at lumebox, we provide with every purchase and encourage the use of protective eyewear while administering red light therapy. dr michael hamblin, one of the world's leading researchers in red light therapy, believes red light therapy may be beneficial in pregnancy. lumebox offers the most competitively priced device available today for one of the strongest and high-quality portable rlt devices on the market. we believe every body deserves a red-light therapy device designed to deliver red and infrared light wavelengths in the comfort of your own home or on the go wherever you are. lumebox is a global red light therapy (rlt) lifestyle brand dedicated to the health and well-being of all individuals. lumebox is independently tested to be 87% more powerful than leading competitors i.e. shorter treatments are needed, saving you precious time.
generated_description: lumebox is a company that specializes in red light therapy (rlt) devices, which is the safe application of red and near-infrared light to penetrate through the skin and aid in the production of cellular energy. this process, also known as photobiomodulation, biostimulation, led light therapy or low-level laser therapy (lllt), is used to activate mitochondria, which are the "power generators" of cells. unlike sunlight, which contains uv rays that can cause skin damage, red light does not damage or burn the skin, and research has shown that it may benefit the skin. lumebox devices charge 94% faster than industry leaders and have double the battery life, and utilize 25% more leds, covering more body surface areas. the company's devices are independently tested to be 87% more powerful than leading competitors.
